Netizen submission
Because Hu Xijin spoke out for Xiaoguo Company and House, he was criticized and reported by a large number of netizens.
Currently, a netizen of Toutiao posted the result of the report: Hu Xijin's account has been under key monitoring.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 15, 34 teachers in Sanmenxia City, Henan Province, announced a hunger strike in protest.
The reason is that they have been working intensively every day for four years, but the establishment has not been implemented so far, there is no contract, no salary, no social security, and no provident fund. They have reported it to the competent department many times but to no avail.

Netizen contribution
On May 21, pet lovers in Shanghai planned to hold a memorial event at Xuhui Greenland Riverside for the previous "Jack Spicy Strips Cat Abuse" incident
The event was later reported and cancelled.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: A follow-up post on the Zhejiang government administrative penalty disclosure incident a few days ago. After the public opinion fermented, the 6 gay men's gathering for lewdness was still retained, but the 16 men and women's gathering for lewdness were secretly deleted. The reason is currently unknown.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Micron's chips are banned from being sold to mainland China
On May 21, the Cybersecurity Review Office issued a notice that Micron's products have serious cybersecurity risks, posing a major security risk to my country's critical information infrastructure supply chain and affecting my country's national security.
Operators of China's critical information infrastructure should stop purchasing Micron's products.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Sudden major live broadcast accident
On May 21, at the CSGO Paris Major Finals
Just now, someone raised the "Snow Lion Flag" at the scene, causing all the live broadcast rooms in mainland China to be interrupted for several minutes.

Netizen contribution
Universities in Sichuan and Chongqing require students to follow the public account "Jiu Wanli"
to learn about the latest current affairs and policies and clarify the understanding of current affairs.
It is reported that the public account was registered on April 28 and mainly focuses on current affairs commentary.
